fileExist: The name of project already exists
sureToUpload: When clicking yes, your teacher will be able to view your project.
uploadFirst: You have to upload file first
chooseFileFirst: You have to choose file first
appIsDemo: This copy is a demo, not all the courses are available
fileName: Give a name for your project
whatToDo: What do you want to do with this project
urlError: Cannot load project, check internet connection
